block.p: JACOBY-Eva (nee Michaelis). On May 22, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Gustav. Loving mother of Sylvia Cohn and Stephen Jacoby. Dear sister of Ilse Wollman. Adoring grandmother of Melissa Cohn, Joshua Cohn, Priscilla Karnovsky, Liza Cohn, Tad Cohn, Raphael Jacoby and Tobias Jacoby. Grandmother-in-law of Seth, Dan, Bill and Sharon. Great grandmother of Sarah Alvarez, Samantha Paprin, Rebecca Cohn, Sydney and Nicholas Karnovsky and Benjamin and Gus Wallach. Service Wednesday 1:15 PM at ''The Riverside'', 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
JACOBY-Eva. Sisterhood of Congregation Habonim mourns the loss of our past Sisterhood President, Eva Jacoby.
